title: Continental Tyres Cup final scheduled for March 14 at Wycombe's Adams Park
description: Wycombe’s Adams Park will play host to this season’s Continental Tyres Cup final.
content: Holders Manchester City Women face four-time winners Arsenal in the final, which has been pushed back to Wednesday March 14 KO 7pm.City beat Chelsea to reach the final and are aiming to lift the trophy for the third time in four years.The original date for the final, Sunday March 11, was just two days after England are scheduled to return from the SheBelieves Cup, where the Lionesses play France, Germany and the United States.England's clash with France on March 1 in Columbus, Ohio, will see newly-appointed manager Phil Neville take charge of the Lionesses for the first time.
